cleaned_text: Acupuncture & Traditional Chinese Medicine Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) is an ancient healing system established thousands of years ago. Tiny, sterile, disposable needles are inserted into very specific points along the body, promoting blood flow, alleviating pain, and restoring balance. Acupuncture is most notably effective for treating pain, but is also helpful for a wide variety of other conditions. Other TCM techniques include whole-foods nutrition, cupping, deep tissue and Tui Na massage, Gua Sha, and Chinese herbal medicine.
